i love cooking.

my parents taught me to find inspiration in the world.
I'll be watching wrestling with my boyfriend.

content.text: Hi
Hi there!
What are you up to?
I'm just reading up on some holistic health stuff.
Interesting! What kind of stuff?
I'm trying to learn about how to cook more healthy meals.
That's cool! I love to cook too.
Oh yeah? What kind of food do you like to make?
I like to make a lot of different things, but I'm really into making soups and stews lately.
That sounds really good. I've been meaning to try making some more soups myself.
You should! They're really easy and you can make a big batch and freeze them for later.
That's a great idea. I'll have to give it a try.
You should! And if you need any recipes, I can always give you some pointers.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read. I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love to read fantasy fiction.
Oh, that's cool! I love reading historical fiction.
That's cool too! I've never really gotten into historical fiction, but I've heard good things about it.
You should check it out! There are some really great historical fiction novels out there.
I'll have to do that. Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome
